entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
